General.Name: Zhejiang Xiantong Rubber&Plastic Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Xiantong Rubber&Plastic Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, design, production, and sale of automobile parts in China. The company's products include automobile sealing strips, such as front door frame sealing strips, door upper sealing strips, back door frame sealing strips, water cut outside doors, windshield exterior trim strips, triangular window glass sealing strips, trunk sealing strips, and sunroof sealing strips, as well as roof trims and door glass guides. It also offers metal rolling parts comprising door glass rails, sliding door slides, and luggage rack spacers. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Taizhou, China.
General.Address: Modern Industrial Cluster Area, Taizhou, China, 317306
